name: Breaking Elf
description:
BREAKING ELF

Elves working in Santa's workshop have had enough.
They've decided to break everything in Santa's workshop!

Play Mode: 2 - 4 player Couch Co-Op Brawler
Requirements: At least two methods of control (you can use a keyboard and controller, or two controllers minimum)

CONTROLS

KEYBOARD

Movement - Arrows / WASD
Jump - Space
Pick Up + Drop - E
Throw - Q / J
Melee - F / KCONTROLLER

Movement - Left Stick
Jump - A / Cross
Pick Up + Drop - B / Circle
Throw - Shoulder Buttons
Melee - X / Y / Square / Triangle

CREDITS

Game Design: Francesco / Luke
Game Mechanics: Redd / Shaun
Sound and Effects: Daniel
3D Art: Darren
Moral Support: Joana

FINAL NOTE
There are some game-breaking bugs in this release. An updated version will be uploaded when voting ends.
